thread.section_title: www.blazingglass.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.blazingglass.com | blazingglass.com | 2 of 32
thread.title: Rich Lookabaugh

author: Rich Lookabaugh
title: Rich Lookabaugh
text:
I had a great experience, I called with some questions on the phone, and got some great help. The customer service department answered all my questions, directed me to the correct place on the website, helped me find exactly what I was looking for, and even more. Also pointed out that there was an additional promo going on and I was able to apply it to my order which saved me 35% more.
Thank you
